title: Watch: Tree Struck By Lightning Burns From Inside, People Say 'This Is What Hell Looks Like'
text:
Watch: Tree Struck By Lightning Burns From Inside, People Say 'This Is What Hell Looks Like'

Watch: Tree Struck By Lightning Burns From Inside, People Say 'This Is What Hell Looks Like'

Talking about bizarre incidents, a tree was found burning from inside. Maybe it is not uncommon but it is definitely bizarre! Nature offers something new everyday, but this is so bizarre that it becomes hard to believe such a thing.

Recently, a video where a tree was struck by lightning and began to burn from inside did not take much time to go viral. The video shows, fire raging inside the tree trunk and later in the video we can see some part of the tree turning into ashes.

The caption of the video reads, ‘A look inside a tree that has been struck by lightning’. Here is the video:

A look inside a tree that has been struck by lightning. pic.twitter.com/IGcgu00fYm — So Fain (@sofain) October 20, 2019

The place where the video has been shot is not known. The video has garnered 16.5 million views, 512.9k likes and many comments:

Don't Miss 129 SHARES 222 SHARES 429 SHARES

1.

So this is what the gates of hell look like — Amonimus the Retromancer (@SuminomAmonimus) October 20, 2019

2.

My gastrointestinal system post-Chipotles. — Mike Sellraiser III: Sell on Earth (@mike_sell) October 20, 2019

3.

4.

If you put your hand inside it you get superpowers. — 🇺🇸Let’s Talk CaptainAmerica🇺🇸 (@RubenEllis20) October 20, 2019

5.

It’s like the different doors in The Nightmare Before Christmas but this one leads to hell. — Nina Bonina LG6IsComingForOurEdges Brown (@CallMeJoanneXO) October 20, 2019

6.

Looks cool, but that poor tree is burning from the inside out. If trees could talk, that one would be screaming — 💀Skeleton In A Lady Suit💀 (@GenocidalFetus) October 20, 2019

7.

It is just sad to see trees burning like that! First Amazon, then Aarey and now this, we need to do something about this otherwise there will be a day when there will be no trees in sight. Have you ever thought about that?
description: Talking about bizarre incidents, a tree was found burning from inside. Maybe it is not uncommon but it is definitely bizarre! Nature offers something new everyday, but this is so bizarre that it becomes hard to believe such a thing. Recently, a video of the unique incident where a tree is struck by lightning and began to burn from inside and videos like these do not take much time to go viral
